exercises.name: Kettlebell Swing
exercises.description: Explosive hip hinge to power the bell overhead and ignite the posterior chain.

exercises.name: Push-Up to T Rotation
exercises.description: Alternate a side plank reach between each rep to build rotational stability.

exercises.name: Reverse Lunge & Press
exercises.description: Step back, drop the knee, and drive overhead with the opposite arm on return.

exercises.name: Renegade Row
exercises.description: Brace through the core, row the bell, and resist trunk rotation under load.

exercises.name: V-Up Reach
exercises.description: Snap to a V-sit while touching toes and controlling the eccentric descent.

exercises.name: Squat Thruster
exercises.description: Sink deep into a squat and explode into a powerful overhead drive.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Snatch
exercises.description: Drive through the hips and punch overhead for total-body power.

exercises.name: Box Jump Rebound
exercises.description: Explode onto the box, stick the landing, and rebound with athletic control.

exercises.name: Battle Rope Slams
exercises.description: Alternate heavy slams to spike the heart rate and challenge core stability.

exercises.name: Assault Bike Sprint
exercises.description: Crank max effort through the pedals and handles for a brutal finisher.

workouts.title: Mobility Reset
workouts.summary: Restore and lengthen with controlled tempo.

exercises.name: World's Greatest Stretch
exercises.description: Flow between lunge, thoracic reach, and hamstring sweep to open the chain.

exercises.name: Thread the Needle
exercises.description: Mobilise the thoracic spine while keeping hips stacked and breathing steady.

exercises.name: Cossack Squat
exercises.description: Sink into lateral depth to unlock hips and ankles with control.

exercises.name: Dead Bug Reach
exercises.description: Brace the core while moving opposing limbs through controlled range.

exercises.name: Prone Snow Angels
exercises.description: Sweep the arms overhead while squeezing the upper back and glutes.

exercises.name: 90/90 Switch
exercises.description: Rotate through internal and external hip rotation without leaning back.
